For those having issues with DX11 error:
1) Update your videocard drives. 
2) After that go to their website and install beta version drivers on top of that.
3) Instal system updates. I realise that it doesnt sound like it should help, but it does.
4) Reboot
6) At this point my DX11 error changed to a different one
7) Instal steam. Don't have to logic or create an account, but have to download and install it. Again, I know that this doesn't sound like it should help but strangely enough it does.
8) Enjoy the game.
